Header: President appoints a sub-committee to determine what has happened to  narcotics taken into custody from raids
Content: The President has instructed the cabinet to take immediate action to determine whats happened to the narcotics that were apprehended from various raids. The president requested that a detailed report be submitted to him without delay . The president also appointed a cabinet sub-committee comprising of ministers Sagala Ratnayake, Wijedasa Rajapaksa and Susil Premajayanta to oversee the investigation. The cabinet met with President Maithripala Sirisena yesterday.
